vista.graph
Class GEAttr

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GEAttr
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attributes
Direct Known Subclasses:
CurveAttr, GraphAttr, LineElementAttr, PlotAttr, TextLineAttr, TickLineAttr
public class GEAttr
extends java.lang.Object
implements Attributes

Encapsulates all attributes of a GraphicElement. This sets up a parallel hierarchy to that of the GraphicElement with a attribute class for every GraphicElement subclass.

Currently all attributes are declared to be public with no accessor or modifier functions. This has a problem in that something like LegendItem which has both LineElement and TextLine cannot inherit those characteristics for both classes at once. This can be solved by declaring each property as setX and getX functions and declaring each attribute class to be a collection of such functions.

Version:
$Id: GEAttr.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:56 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu (DWR).

_backgroundColor

public java.awt.Color _backgroundColor
background color. When this is set for a graphic element it usually overwrites the already drawn stuff in the drawing region

_orientation

public int _orientation
orientation

_createGraphicsCopy

public boolean _createGraphicsCopy
true if graphics should be copied. The alternative is to reset the graphics after changing attributes such as font, color, etcetra. Obviously creating graphic copies are not cheap.

public boolean _isVisible
true if visible.
